Header_HowItWork_Connect.titleLogo: A SAFER, MORE CONVENIENT WAY TO CARSHARE
Header_HowItWork_Connect.contentHeader: No other carsharing service offers contactless sharing using Getaround Connect®. With your Android or iOS       phone and the Getaround app, you can find, book, and unlock a car, truck, or van near you. Getaround is the   leading global and digital carsharing marketplace. Try it today.

BodyKeyFeatures_HowItWork_Connect.title: GPS tracking
BodyKeyFeatures_HowItWork_Connect.description: Getaround Connect® enables us to securely track each car's location during Getaround trips, which means we can provide roadside assistance to guests in real-time if they experience any mechanical troubles during their trips.

BodyKeyFeatures_HowItWork_Connect.title: Security
BodyKeyFeatures_HowItWork_Connect.description: Theft-deterrent functionality disables the car's starter when the vehicle is not in use by the host or by a verified guest, so long as the host has enabled

BodyKeyFeatures_HowItWork_Connect.title: Contactless sharing
BodyKeyFeatures_HowItWork_Connect.description: Book and unlock with confidence. Getaround Connect® means you don't need a physical hand-off of keys.

BodyKeyFeatures_HowItWork_Connect.title: Location
BodyKeyFeatures_HowItWork_Connect.description: Getaround Connect® helps hosts find their cars quickly if they’re street-parked without a designated parking space.
